itunes:title: Lent Week 4 with Kelly Minter
title: Lent Week 4 with Kelly Minter
description:
During the fourth week of our Lenten study of Ezekiel, Raechel sits down with Kelly Minter, a singer, writer, speaker, and student of God’s Word. Together, they reflect on the despair we find throughout Ezekiel as we come face-to-face with the Lord’s response to sin. Yet, it’s in the book of Ezekiel that we have a chance to sit in and think on the darkness of our own sin, knowing that this is the very darkness Jesus has rescued us from. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 4 of the She Reads Truth Lent 2022: Come to Life reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Lent 2022 collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/lent-week-4-with-kelly-minter
